posts.author: DzmitryB
posts.content:
Search

Modified skill ranks needed to:

DETECT non-epic traps, all classes
Eventual: 22 - 20 = 2
Immediate: 22 - 1 = 21

DETECT epic traps, rogue only
Eventual: 43 - 20 = 23
Immediate: 43 - 1 = 42

posts.author: Roxiee
posts.content:
Thank you for that.  Just curious, what is the -1 for?

And modified means I can just put 17 points in Search and a level 16 bard song can take it to Immediate detection right?

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: The -1 means that you succeed with a roll of a 1 on the d20 skill check.  If you use -20 instead, you get the Search skill need to eventually detect the trap when you finally get a roll of 20.

posts.author: Roxiee
posts.content:

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
It's up to you, of course, but I'd be tempted to get Search up to 16 (21). I'd do this by dropping the Spellcraft by 1 point to 37 (40) (it works in multiples of 5 modified ranks, unlike Tumble which relies on inputted ranks), and either UMD to 30 (33) (though as a Bard you don't really need that many ranks in any case) or lose Appraise, Bluff and Persuade completely.

Cheers
